channel.title: selection on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in selection on Barefoot Rob

item.title: new game at toy store
item.description: 18:43 Tuesday 19 May 2015 JST 柴田さん showed me a new-to-me game at the toy store. Roll a bunch of dice and players take turns selecting as many of the same-color / same-face dice that they wish. The person who is left with the last die is the loser. She was shocked that I hadn’t seen the game before! We also played with the tops, one of which was a round block of wood with a pencil for its axle.
